data.name: ZPlague
data.detailed_description:
Just one more zombie game.
ZPlague brings the player-zombie interaction on another level. While different zombies can use different skills to chase soldiers, the soldiers can use grenades, barricades, can fly or lasers to avoid them. Both teams should work together with his mates to win, so don't forget that you are not alone.

This game does not bring your emotions to the surface.
Imagine yourself in an enclosed arena with tall, fast zombies screaming and running towards you. The only thing you have is a gun, with limited ammo, and some skills that depends of which soldier you are. You may have other mates, but they can also become zombies.

Same thing over and over again.
You will start playing with a cool gun and cool zombie, but the more you play, the more you unlock other zombies and other guns.

The "arena" is not designed to the game purpose.
Our team has made sure to design a map where smart players will be able to avoid zombies, and zombies will be able to surround players, depending only on map knowledge and thinking.

In this continually evolving title, soldiers must try to survive against powerful zombies using all your weapons and items, and zombies should try to infect all players using skills and advantage traits.

data.short_description: Armed militaries are requested to clean an area infested by zombies. On each round you don't now if you will be a zombie or a soldier, so use the skills and items that was given to you and keep alert.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.90 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.40 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Minimum:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
